Key Match Events: Ryan Christie scored the first goal for Scotland in the 33rd minute
Igor Matanovic equalized for Croatia three minutes later
Andrej Kramaric scored the winning goal for Croatia in the 70th minute
Che Adams had a last-minute goal ruled out by VAR
Post-Match Reflections: Steve Clarke insists Scotland are ‘on the right path’ after their luckless side had a last-gasp goal ruled out to lose 2-1 to Croatia in Zagreb
Miscellaneous Highlights: Scotland’s winless run in competitive games grew to nine games
Without up to 12 players due to injury, Scotland struck first
Others: The match took place in Zagreb, Croatia
The match was part of the Nations League
